Music store Shopping Cart

About this project

This is a music store website. The shopping cart is implemented by using only Vanilla JavaScript. Users can add items into the cart, increase or decrease the quantity. They also can remove the item from the shopping cart. When the users are done with putting all the items, they can see the total price. If users try to enter the same item twice, a pop-up window will show up saying that the item is already in the cart.
